subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat may have grasped the lesson that no N.B.A. team — not even one with LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh — is ever assured of winning anything.
snippet: The Miami Heat may have grasped the lesson that no N.B.A. team — not even one with LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh — is ever assured of winning anything.
